verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3060"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jehu, \w Joash|strong="H3060"\w* \f + \fr 12:1 \ft Hebrew Jehoash, a variant of Joash (son of Ahaziah); also in verses 2, 4, 6, 7, and 18; see 2 Kings 11:2.\f* \w became|strong="H4427"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* Jerusalem forty \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. \w His|strong="H3060"\w* mother’s name \w was|strong="H1121"\w* Zibiah; she \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* Beersheba.

\w And|strong="H3389"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3060"\w* \w did|strong="H3389"\w* what \w was|strong="H8034"\w* right \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3058"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* all \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w days|strong="H8141"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* instructed \w by|strong="H8141"\w* Jehoiada \w the|strong="H3058"\w* priest.

Nevertheless, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H6213"\w* \w places|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* removed; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5869"\w* continued sacrificing \w and|strong="H3068"\w* burning incense \w there|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* Joash said \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w priests|strong="H3808"\w*, “Collect \w all|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* money \w brought|strong="H5493"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* sacred gifts \w into|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* house \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*—\w the|strong="H5493"\w* census money, \w the|strong="H5493"\w* money \w from|strong="H5493"\w* vows, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* money \w brought|strong="H5493"\w* voluntarily \w into|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* house \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* receive \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* constituency, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H5315"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w used|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* repair \w any|strong="H3605"\w* damage \w found|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*.”

\w By|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* twenty-third year \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* reign \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Joash, \w however|strong="H4672"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w had|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3947"\w* \w yet|strong="H3605"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* damage \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3060"\w* called Jehoiada \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* other \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H6242"\w* said, “\w Why|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* damage \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*? \w Now|strong="H1961"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w*, \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* money \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* constituency, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* hand \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* agreed \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* people \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w themselves|strong="H2388"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* Jehoiada \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* chest, bored \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hole \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w its|strong="H3947"\w* lid, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* set \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w beside|strong="H1115"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* altar \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* right side \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w one|strong="H1004"\w* enters \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. There \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* guarded \w the|strong="H3947"\w* threshold \w put|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w into|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Whenever|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* saw \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w large|strong="H1004"\w* amount \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* chest, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* royal scribe \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* high \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w count|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w into|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* tie \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* bags.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w counted|strong="H5608"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* hands \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* supervised \w the|strong="H7200"\w* work \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H1961"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w pay|strong="H3701"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* doing \w the|strong="H7200"\w* work—\w the|strong="H7200"\w* carpenters, builders,

\w masons|strong="H2796"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stonecutters. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* purchased \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w dressed|strong="H6213"\w* stone \w to|strong="H3318"\w* repair \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w damage|strong="H6485"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w paid|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* other expenses \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* repairs.

However, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* money \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3318"\w* \w used|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w making|strong="H3605"\w* silver basins, wick trimmers, sprinkling bowls, trumpets, \w or|strong="H1004"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* articles \w of|strong="H1004"\w* gold \w or|strong="H1004"\w* silver \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Instead|strong="H3808"\w*, \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* paid \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* repaired \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w No|strong="H6213"\w* accounting \w was|strong="H3068"\w* required \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w received|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* money \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w workmen|strong="H4399"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w acted|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* integrity.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* guilt \w offerings|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* sin \w offerings|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* house \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w it|strong="H5414"\w* belonged \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3808"\w*. The Death of Joash (2 Chronicles 24:23–27)

\w At|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* Hazael king \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aram marched \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fought \w against|strong="H3068"\w* Gath \w and|strong="H3068"\w* captured \w it|strong="H1961"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w decided|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* attack Jerusalem.

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Joash \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Judah \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sacred objects dedicated \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* fathers—Jehoshaphat, Jehoram, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Ahaziah, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Judah—\w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w own|strong="H6440"\w* consecrated \w items|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* gold found \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* treasuries \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* palace, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w sent|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram. \w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w withdrew|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* acts \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3060"\w*, \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* accomplishments, \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* written \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Book \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Chronicles \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* servants \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w rose|strong="H4428"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* formed \w a|strong="H3068"\w* conspiracy \w and|strong="H3063"\w* killed \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* Beth-millo, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* road \w down|strong="H3789"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Silla.

\w His|strong="H5221"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* Jozabad \f + \fr 12:21 \ft Hebrew; LXX and Syriac Jozacar\f* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Shimeath \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Jehozabad son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Shomer \f + \fr 12:21 \ft Shomer is a variant of Shimrith; see 2 Chronicles 24:26.\f* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* died. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H5221"\w* buried \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* fathers \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* City \w of|strong="H1004"\w* David, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* son Amaziah reigned \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w place|strong="H1004"\w*.
